title: Living tomorrow. No. 151
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Looks over new ways of managing the increasing and complex problems which face us today. Computer simulations, for instance, show how to cope with the complexity of planning a modern airport and designing a motorway, but coping with complexity doesn’t always involve the computer.
